item.description:
We are very happy to finally be able to send out the details on our luncheon.

Shangri La at Village Walk on the Post Road in Guilford has been very accommodating and we just know it will be a great meeting. An assortment of appetizers and main dishes will be offered at each table, so there will be no need to pre-order.

Time and date are set for Friday December 17 from 11:30 to 1ish. If you have a scheduling conflict, come a bit late or leave early. You will still be able to share some of the tasty food and enjoy the company of the group.

There will be a $15 fixed price for food and tea. If you want a glass of wine or other beverage they will be available on a pay as you go basis.

We thought it would be fun to have a raffle, so if anyone can bring an item, gift certificate for services, etc., please do. The more the merrier as they say.

We will also be gathering words of encouragement for Nikki Rasmussen of YOLO as she deals with the fire that recently destroyed her business location. Nikki has been a great supporter of AWBL and has payed it forward to many women in the community. Please be thinking of her.


Jingling all the way,
Your leadership team
item.name: December 17th AWBL Holiday Luncheon at Shangri La
